Description: We are hiring Online Data Analysts in Thailand (Thai speakers)We are hiring freelance English and Thai-speaking Online Data Analysts for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task.
